title: SMC_TRAFOF_Scara2 (FunctionBlock)
text:
FUNCTION_BLOCK SMC_TRAFOF_Scara2
Forward transformation for 2-dim. Scara system.
Note
For detailed information on transformation modules
see overview to
SM_Trafo_POUs
.

rows.Name: dOffsetA
rows.Comment:
Additional offset for A-axis in degree
(equivalent toSMC_TRAFO_SCARA2)

rows:
Additional offset for B-axis in degree
(equivalent toSMC_TRAFO_SCARA2)
Arm length of first arm in t.u.
Arm length of second arm in t.u.
X-position of manipulator in geo coordinates
Y-position of manipulator in geo coordinates

Drive position in degrees without offset
(joint angle for visualization)

Drive position in degrees without offset
(joint angle for visualization)

X-coordinate (in]-1,1[) of normed position vector of
first joint (for visualization purpose)

Y-coordinate (in]-1,1[) of normed position vector of
first joint (for visualization purpose)

X-coordinate (in]-1,1[) of normed position vector of
manipulator (for visualization purpose)

Y-coordinate (in]-1,1[) of normed position vector of
manipulator (for visualization purpose)
